ComicInfo.Characters: Hellstrike,Strafe [Malcolm King] (villain),Stormwatch [Spartan,Fahrenheit,Talos,Hexon,Diva (dead),Henry Bendix,Timeslip (cameo),Fuji,Link,Warguard [Judgment,Doreen] (villains),Nychus,Pagan],Despot [Isaiah King] (villain),Undertow,Battalion [Jackson King] (cameo),Weatherman One [Synergy]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:47:44 [Issue ID 4000-130084] urn:comicvine:4000-130084 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:37:33. [Issue ID 174866]
ComicInfo.Summary: Stormwatch tries to recover from the betrayal of Strafe and the death of Diva at the hands of Despot. Synergy decides to make a sacrifice play by luring Despot and the Warguard onto Skywatch and then blowing the station up. While Stormwatch takes off, Hellstrike stays behind to lure the bad guys in; Battalion and Timeslip arrive from one year in the past.
